    <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Tune in to the 24-hour Impact Challenge Livestream</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      


<article about="/ImpactChallengeLivestream" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-tsigmund odd clearfix" id="node-article-2347">
        <span property="dc:title" content="Tune in to the 24-hour Impact Challenge Livestream" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>	  
    
    <div class="post-date">Posted on 11-08-16</div>		
		<div class="share-bar">
			<a class="print_ico" href="/print/ImpactChallengeLivestream">Print</a>
			<!-- <a class="pdf_ico" href="/printpdf/ImpactChallengeLivestream">PDF</a> -->
			<span class='st_email_custom st_ico' displayText='Email'></span>
			<span class='st_twitter_custom st_ico' displayText='Tweet'></span>
			<span class='st_facebook_custom st_ico' displayText='Facebook'></span>
			<span class='st_linkedin_custom st_ico' displayText='LinkedIn'></span>
			<span class='st_google_custom st_ico' displayText='Google'></span>
			<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script>
			<script type="text/javascript" src="http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js"></script>
			<script type="text/javascript">
				stLight.options({
		        publisher: 'f65a6e51-8a93-4acd-a665-976809c16a17',
		        onhover: false
		    });</script>
		</div>

    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-field-main-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/article_image/public/content/article/images/main/RIC.LIVESTREAM.1920x1080-INTERNAL.jpg?itok=4LL6mipX" width="700" height="394" alt="" /></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>We&#39;re counting down the last day of the Impact Challenge during a livestream hosted at the main Riot campus in Los Angeles, California. Join a rotating cast of Rioters including Dash and Scarizard, along with Foxdrop, Jimmy Wong, Rocket Jump, and other special guests starting at 10:00 AM PST on Friday, November 11, as we game for 24 hours straight. We&rsquo;ll be playing <em>League</em>, <em>Mechs vs Minions</em>, and more of our favorite games on the official <a href="https://www.twitch.tv/leagueoflegends" target="_blank"><em>League of Legends</em> Twitch channel</a>.</p>
<p>We&rsquo;ve partnered with Omaze to put on the Impact Challenge in support of four non-profit orgs. You can unlock different rewards based on how much you give, and Omaze is sending five grand prize winners along with their guests to the All-Star Event in Barcelona! <a href="http://www.riotgames.com/RiotImpactChallenge">Learn more about the challenge and the charities over here</a>, and then <a href="https://www.omaze.com/previews/experiences/100184">visit the Omaze website to enter</a>!<br />
	<br />
	GLHF, and we&rsquo;ll see you during the livestream!&nbsp;</p>
<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="378" scrolling="no" src="https://player.twitch.tv/?channel=leagueoflegends" width="700"></iframe></p>
 </div></div></div>
        
    <span class="print-link"></span>  </div>

  </div>
</div>      </div>
</div><aside class="grid-3 region region-sidebar-first" id="region-sidebar-first">

    <div class="block block-views block-related-articles-block block-views-related-articles-block odd block-without-title" id="block-views-related-articles-block">

<h1>Los Angeles</h1>

  &nbsp;</div></div><article about="/careers/development-manager-latam" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-jobs node-teaser node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-prakes odd clearfix" id="node-jobs-1643">
        <header>
    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/careers/development-manager-latam" title="Development Manager (LATAM)">Development Manager (LATAM)</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="Development Manager (LATAM)" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>Riot Games was established in 2006 by entrepreneurial gamers who believe that player-focused game development can result in great games. In 2009, Riot released its debut title <em>League of Legends</em> to critical and player acclaim. As the most played PC game in the world, over 67 million play every month. Players form the foundation of our community and its for them that we continue to evolve and improve the <em>League of Legends</em> experience. </p></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"><ul class="links inline"><li class="node-readmore first last"><a href="/careers/development-manager-latam" rel="tag" title="Development Manager (LATAM)">Read more<span class="element-invisible"> about Development Manager (LATAM)</span></a></li></ul></nav>
    
      </div>

  </header>

In 2009, Riot released its debut title <em>League of Legends</em> to critical and player acclaim. Recently named the most played PC game in the world, over 67 million play every month. Players form the foundation of our community and its for them that we continue to evolve and improve the <em>League of Legends</em> experience.<br /><br /></p></div></div></div>  </div>

        <header>
    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/careers/senior-producer-0" title="Senior Producer">Senior Producer</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="Senior Producer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <div>
	<p>Riot Games was established in 2006 by entrepreneurial gamers who believe that player-focused game development can result in great games. In 2009, Riot released its debut title League of Legends to critical and player acclaim. As the most played PC game in the world, over 67 million play every month. Players form the foundation of our community and its for them that we continue to evolve and improve the <em>League of Legends </em>experience. </p></div></div></div></div>  </div>

</article><article about="/careers/it-qa-engineer" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-jobs node-teaser node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky self-posted author- even clearfix" id="node-jobs-1616">
        <header>
    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/careers/it-qa-engineer" title="IT QA Engineer">IT QA Engineer</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="IT QA Engineer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>Riot Games was established in 2006 by entrepreneurial gamers who believe that player-focused game development can result in great games. In 2009, Riot released its debut title <em>League of Legends</em> to critical and player acclaim. As the most played PC game in the world, over 67 million play every month. Players form the foundation of our community and its for them that we continue to evolve and improve the <em>League of Legends</em> experience. </p></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"><ul class="links inline"><li class="node-readmore first last"><a href="/careers/it-qa-engineer" rel="tag" title="IT QA Engineer">Read more<span class="element-invisible"> about IT QA Engineer</span></a></li></ul></nav>
    
      </div>

			  <table width="250" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
                <tr>
                  <td height="20" align="left" valign="middle"><img src="imgs/line_divisor_lateral.jpg" alt="" width="221" height="6" /></td>

              <div class="fb-recommendations" data-site="cursos.r7.com" data-action="likes, recommends" data-width="220" data-colorscheme="light" data-header="true"></div>
              </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top">
<script type="text/javascript">
(function () {
    //objeto
    var omnitureObject = {
        "page_name": "cursos",
        "site_section": "cursos",
        "sub_section": "",
        "sub_section_2": "",
        "sub_section_3": "",
        "content_type": 'home',
        "content_title": '',
        "data_publicacao": '2014-10-17T00:02:00-03:00',
        "url_pagina": "http://cursos.r7.com/"
    };
    //fim objeto

    //inicio criacao tracker
    (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
        i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r;
        i[r] = i[r] || function () {
            (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
        }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date();
        a = s.createElement(o), m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];
        a.async = 1;
        a.src = g;
        m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
    })(window, document, 'script', 'https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');
    ga('create', 'UA-10631407-1', 'auto');
    //fim criacao tracker

    omnitureObject = (typeof omnitureObject !== 'undefined') ? omnitureObject : {};

    if (omnitureObject.page_name) {
        ga('set', 'dimension1', omnitureObject.page_name);
    }
    if (omnitureObject.site_section) {
        ga('set', 'dimension2', omnitureObject.site_section);
    }
    if (omnitureObject.sub_section) {
        ga('set', 'dimension3', omnitureObject.sub_section);
    }
    if (omnitureObject.sub_section_2) {
        ga('set', 'dimension4', omnitureObject.sub_section_2);
    }
    if (omnitureObject.sub_section_3) {
        ga('set', 'dimension5', omnitureObject.sub_section_3);
    }
    if (omnitureObject.content_type) {
        ga('set', 'dimension7', omnitureObject.content_type);
    }
    if (omnitureObject.content_title) {
        ga('set', 'dimension8', omnitureObject.content_title);
    }
    if (omnitureObject.data_publicacao) {
        ga('set', 'dimension9', omnitureObject.data_publicacao);
    }
    if (omnitureObject.url_pagina) {
        ga('set', 'dimension10', omnitureObject.url_pagina);
    }

    omnitureObject.reset_content_id = function (content_id) {
        omnitureObject.content_id = content_id;
        ga('set', 'dimension6', omnitureObject.content_id);
    };

    omnitureObject.reset_content_type = function (content_type) {
        omnitureObject.content_type = content_type;
        ga('set', 'dimension7', omnitureObject.content_type);
    };

    ga('send', 'pageview');

    //Tag comscore
    var _comscore = _comscore || [];
    _comscore.push({
        c1: "2",
        c2: "14194541",
        ns_site: "portal-r7",
        name: omnitureObject.page_name.replace(/:/g, "."),
        channel: omnitureObject.site_section.replace(/:/g, "."),
        content_source: "parceiros"
    });
    var s = document.createElement("script"),
        el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
    s.async = true;
    s.src = (document.location.protocol == "https:" ? "https://sb" : "http://b") + ".scorecardresearch.com/beacon.js";
    el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
    //Fim Tag comscore

})();
</script>
<noscript>
	<img width="1" height="1" src="http://b.scorecardresearch.com/p?c1=2&c2=14194541&cv=2.0&cj=1" />

g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>
</div><div id="glb-corpo" class="glb-corpo"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_floating"><div id="banner_floating" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div><div class="row show-for-medium-up"><div class="column
                    small-24
                    medium-24
                    large-24 large-offset-0
                    xlarge-22 xlarge-offset-1"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_slb_topo"><div id="banner_slb_topo" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div><div class="areatemplate-topo row-full-width"></div><div class="row"><div class="small-24 column areatemplate-showtime"></div></div><div class="row"><div class="areatemplate-meio
                column
                medium-20 medium-offset-2
                large-24 large-offset-0
                xlarge-22 xlarge-offset-1"></div></div><div class="row small-collapse medium-uncollapse"><div class="areatemplate-direita-superior
                    column
                    medium-20 medium-offset-2 medium-pull-2 
                    large-9 large-offset-0 large-pull-0
                    xlarge-7 xlarge-offset-1 xlarge-pull-1
                    float-right"></div><div class="areatemplate-esquerda
                column
                medium-20 medium-offset-2
                large-15 large-offset-0
                xlarge-14 xlarge-offset-1"><script type="text/javascript">SETTINGS=window.SETTINGS||{};SETTINGS.BASTIAN={PORTAL:'TechTudo',FEED_TYPE:'SEMANTICO',DEVICE_GROUP:'desktop',IS_PHOTO_PRIORIZED:false,IS_RECOMMENDED:false,FALKOR_URL:'http://falkor-cda.bastian.globo.com',RECOMMENDATION_URL:'http://recomendacao.globo.com/rec/v2/user?client_id=techtudo',HORIZON_HOST:'http://horizon.globo.com',PUSHSTREAM_HOST:'stream.push.globo.com',QUERY_PARAMETER:'<http://semantica.globo.com/techtudo/Categoria_de_Hardware/100>, <http://semantica.globo.com/techtudo/Categoria_de_Software/100>'};BastianVersion='1.10.0-rc10';</script><script>SETTINGS=window.SETTINGS||{};SETTINGS.BASTIAN=SETTINGS.BASTIAN||{};SETTINGS.BASTIAN["AB_HOST"]="globo-ab.globo.com"</script>

    <div class="grid-9 region region-content region-content-article" id="region-content">
  <div class="region-inner region-content-inner">
    <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Riot Games joins forces with BAMTech</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      


<article about="/articles/20161215/2351/riot-games-joins-forces-bamtech" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-tsigmund odd clearfix" id="node-article-2351">
        <span property="dc:title" content="Riot Games joins forces with BAMTech" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>	  
    
    <div class="post-date">Posted on 12-15-16</div>		
		<div class="share-bar">
			<a class="print_ico" href="/print/articles/20161215/2351/riot-games-joins-forces-bamtech">Print</a>
			<!-- <a class="pdf_ico" href="/printpdf/articles/20161215/2351/riot-games-joins-forces-bamtech">PDF</a> -->
			<span class='st_email_custom st_ico' displayText='Email'></span>
			<span class='st_twitter_custom st_ico' displayText='Tweet'></span>
			<span class='st_facebook_custom st_ico' displayText='Facebook'></span>
			<span class='st_linkedin_custom st_ico' displayText='LinkedIn'></span>
			<span class='st_google_custom st_ico' displayText='Google'></span>
			<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script>
			<script type="text/javascript" src="http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js"></script>
			<script type="text/javascript">
				stLight.options({
		        publisher: 'f65a6e51-8a93-4acd-a665-976809c16a17',
		        onhover: false
		    });</script>
		</div>

    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-field-main-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/article_image/public/content/article/images/main/RG-Header-1920x1080.jpg?itok=sYsk6EBB" width="700" height="395" alt="" /></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-2857019a-063c-458a-0b99-bc115ba4e170">Today we&rsquo;re thrilled to announce Riot Games and BAMTech have entered into a first-of-its-kind long-term commercialization partnership to deliver professional <em>League of Legends </em>esports content in regions around the world. We will be working closely with BAMTech to grow revenue in our sport through various means, including sponsorship and advertising. Beginning next year, we&rsquo;ll also be collaborating to push the boundaries of the esports viewing experience, leveraging BAMTech&rsquo;s best-in-class technology to create additional possibilities and opportunities for fans to access, and connect with, <em>League of Legends</em>.</span></p>
<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-2857019a-063c-458a-0b99-bc115ba4e170">This is a game changer for our sport. As we&rsquo;ve said in the past, true economic sustainability is a critical means to ensuring a sport that lasts, and this represents a major step towards that goal. As an innovator in digital sponsorship and media sales, BAMTech will help us unlock long-lasting and meaningful value for our digital sport as it matures. In BAMTech, we have found a partner equally committed to building professional <em>League of Legends</em> towards the lasting future we believe in for teams, players and fans. We&rsquo;re honored by their faith and belief in our sport.</span></p>
<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-2857019a-063c-458a-0b99-bc115ba4e170">A leading technology services and video streaming company formed by Major League Baseball, BAMTech has designed, developed and distributed world-class fan viewing experiences to millions worldwide across its many traditional sports, news and entertainment partners. We&rsquo;re proud to represent their first step in the esports world and in partnership plan to create innovative and rich ways to add to fans&rsquo; existing options for viewing their <em>League of Legends</em> esports content. We&rsquo;ll be sharing news on important milestones and projects in the future.</span></p>
<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-2857019a-063c-458a-0b99-bc115ba4e170">A development of this magnitude could only be possible with the kind of passionate fan base that supports <em>League of Legends</em>. Fans always will be the foundation for strong and successful sports. This kind of commitment to, and investment in, the sport we all love is a tremendous vote of confidence, and we believe this will unlock incredible things as we build our future together.</span></p>
<p dir="ltr"><span>View original article <a href="http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/riot-games-joins-forces-bamtech" target="_blank">on LoLesports.com</a>.</span></p>
 </div></div></div>
        
    <span class="print-link"></span><div class="field-group-format group_tags field-group-div group-tags clearfix speed-none effect-none"><h3><span>Tags:</span></h3><div class="field field-name-field-topic field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/topic/esports" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">eSports</a></div><div class="field-item odd"><a href="/categories/category-b" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">League of Legends</a></div><div class="field-item even"><a href="/topic/riot-news" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Riot in the News</a></div></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"></nav>

      </div>
</article>
    </div>
  </div>
